attributes.title: Honestly garbage
attributes.review: I don’t usually take the time to write comments on apps but this app is honestly garbage. This app is so bad that it brings out my inner Karen and I felt the need to comment. It’s one of the worst apps I have ever downloaded which is why I’m not surprised by the horrible reviews. This app spread fake news and is incredibly racist and problematic. I would never recommend this app to anyone unless they want to waste their time.

attributes.title: Do not recommend
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it took days to download and when it downloaded my phone shut down for at least 5 days and once it came back on I opened the app and my phone shut down once again but this it stopped working for a full week then my screen turned white and I couldn’t see for a few days so i do not recommend this app

attributes.title: TERRIBLE.
attributes.review: I wanted to support the King. So I opened the app. Once I entered my number my family turned into zombies!! Then I ran away from them ! Once I got outside. I SEEN SIREN HEAD BUT HIS BACK WAS BENT, AND HE WAS CRAWLING LIKE A DOG. Soon I heard. Delete the app, delete the app, delete the app. SOON I SEEN FLYING DOGS AND CATS. THEN EVERYONE SMELLED LIKE PEACHES. I was like “I’m going to die!” Then I looked up in the sky and seen Trump breaking his back? Please don’t download the app. Or you will experience this!

attributes.title: Incredibly Terrible App
attributes.review: So I was scrolling through my feed and came across this app, so I decided to give it a download. Halfway through the download, a tactical nuke obliterated my house to smithereens. 75% through the download, I witnessed my family gunned down and confederate flags stabbed into their corpses. As the download finished, I was kidnapped, hit several times by 45 himself, then personally invited to the White House. Overall 2/10 experience

attributes.title: The worst app
attributes.review: It took forever to download and when it did some music started playing which caused my dog to have a seizure and we lost her! I’ve had my dog for 10 years and THIS APP was her downfall!! I’m am livid and distressed as she was my light. The app also gave my phone glitches and I wasn’t able to use it for so long as everyday I tried turning on my phone it said doing that action was restricted by the app.

attributes.title: This isn’t it...
attributes.review:
This app was created in a manner and format that I did not like. The person who the app was created for should have really put much thought into what was being made and put under their name. I hope they leave all kinds of social media’s after this quite embarrassing situation and hide inside their panic room. Never doing this again... 
xoxo the girl who wants you gone 😘

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: This app is the ✨w✨o✨r✨s✨t✨. It took a month to download and when it finally did it glitched out my phone so bad a demon came out of it. The demon actually became my friend for a while but then it STABBED me in the back. it took my goats and sacrificed them to satan:((( and it made my whole family watch. Then before it left it whispered to me “that’s what you get for downloading the app of the worst president of America” 0/10 would not recommend.

I was looking forward to learn about the president 😉, but this app is HORRIBLE, very glitchy, took Hours to download even tho I have VERY good ✨wifi✨, this app is also hella confusing and hard to understand even tho i am an A plus student💅✨👄😌, and I didn’t even learn anything about him 🤷‍♂️, I wouldn’t recommend this app to anyone, honestly it’s a waste of time, but this why I shall give our orange gods app a one star 🥺👉👈  
Have fun luvs😘

attributes.title: White Power
attributes.review: I, as a proud, red white and blue blooded American, cannot begins to tell y’all how disappointed I am with this app. I find that the UI is incredibly disappointing. Like, where is the specific page to hate on colored folks? Like where do I go. I see too many moderates on here, those who won’t take action into their own hands. I want fascism, and Trump is doing a great job at it, but his supporters are just liberals. Very disappointed

attributes.title: Absolute worst
attributes.review: This app doesn’t even allow me to talk to the president directly. Like how am I supposed to share my hentai collection with him now. If I can’t have a president whom I can’t share hentai with them I don’t want them as my president because it goes to show that this man won’t have any contact with any of the public and then nobody can share hentai with him. At mean at some point things just get too far.🤬🤬😡😡😡🤬🤬
